屌睇到喊撚咗

推 好感動

發夢食煙食到開唔到眼
而且嘔曬白泡要人抬住走
然後睇完E條片先發現原來一切都係值得

A bunch of people just came up from area outside the legislative council. Around 100 people.
I will ask one of these protestors.
Why were you coming (into the chamber)?
Cause we knew through telegram. Four rejected to leave.
So we all decided to come here.
To carry them away.
(weeping)If they don’t leave, we won’t leave.
We pushed them to go with us.
The journalist:(weeping) It is now very near to the deadline of 12 o’clock (police clearance).
Do you afraid that you can’t go out after coming?
(weeping)We are all afraid. But we are more afraid of not seeing them tomorrow. So we came together and we want to leave together.
Journalist: Did anyone call for this action? Or is it a spontaneous one?
At first the loudspeaker man didn’t want (us to come),
to respect their willingness to be sacrificed.
But we came together, and leave together.
It is a decision made by all of us.
Journalist: Just by now, journalists walked on this escalator from the chamber to G/F.
